channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 1 detainee killed and 2 others critically injured in Dallas ICE facility, Homeland Security says
item.description: Federal authorities say a shooter with a rifle opened fire from a roof onto a U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement location in Dallas, killing one detainee and wounding two others before taking his own life.

item.title: What to know about the shooting at a Dallas immigration facility
